rows.label: tev000191_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ].
Your timing is, as always, impeccable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0002
rows.name:
Since I can't seem to find Vandham anywhere,
might I ask for your counsel instead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0003
rows.name:
I've just received an emergency request from a team
of Pathfinders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0004
rows.name:
They've been deployed to an extremely dangerous
area—one where we've lost multiple teams already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0005
rows.name:
At long last, this team succeeded in reaching their
destination. But the data probe they needed to
complete their mission was destroyed in battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0006
rows.name:
So the question is...how should we deliver the
replacement supplies they require?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0007
rows.name:
We could send Harriers or Interceptors, but we can't
dismiss the possibility that they, too, could be wiped
out en route.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0008
rows.name:
So perhaps the better choice is to order the Pathfinders
to retreat, then begin planning a return mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0009
rows.name:
With the experience gained from this first trip—plus
an escort of Harriers and Interceptors—there's a good
chance they could reach the destination again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0010
rows.name:
So what would you choose? Attempt an immediate
delivery of replacement supplies, or abort the mission
and try again later?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_JNK0010
rows.name: Deliver Immediately

rows.label: tev000191_SEL0011
rows.name: Say it's worth the risk to complete the mission.

rows.label: tev000191_JNK0020
rows.name: Abort the Mission

rows.label: tev000191_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest Nagi order a retreat and plan a new mission.

rows.label: tev000191_JNK0030
rows.name: Propose Plan C

rows.label: tev000191_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer to deliver the supplies yourself.

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0011
rows.name:
So you're saying that squandering this opportunity
could prove to be the greater danger?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0012
rows.name:
Hmm. We'd be risking many lives, but that may be the
sort of risk we have to take if we hope to accomplish
anything on this dangerous world...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0013
rows.name:
And after all that you've accomplished as a BLADE,
I don't take your opinion lightly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0014
rows.name:
It's settled then—we'll send the Harriers. If your gambit
succeeds, the benefits to New LA will be considerable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0015
rows.name:
Now I must head back to BLADE HQ and work out the
particulars of the mission. Good day to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0016
rows.name:
Indeed. Our bodies may be mimeosomes, but they're
still too precious an asset to risk without good reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0017
rows.name:
It would be reckless to risk the lives of so many BLADE
operatives on this single mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0018
rows.name:
As a wise man once said, "For he that fights and
runs away, may turn and fight another day."
Let's just hope the second time is the charm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0019
rows.name: I will order the Pathfinders to retreat immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thank you. After all that you've accomplished as a
BLADE, I don't take your opinion lightly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0021
rows.name:
Now I must head back to BLADE HQ and work out the
particulars of the new mission. Good day to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0022
rows.name:
I like the way you think. If I had my druthers, I'd go
out there with you myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0023
rows.name: But I'm afraid this time, it's not an option.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0024
rows.name:
Vandham has put his foot down. He actually insists
that neither one of us can go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0025
rows.name:
BLADE is a large organization, and Elma's team is
hardly the only skilled one at our disposal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0026
rows.name:
Apparently, Vandham thinks I need to utilize some
of these other teams in order to promote group
harmony and effectiveness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000191_MSG0027
rows.name:
This won't be the last time this kind of problem arises,
and we'll need a better plan in the future. But for now,
we need to choose one of these two strategies.[ST:wait ]
